unauthenticated.noAccount: Si vous n'avez pas de compte Formulaires GC,
unauthenticated.title: Se connecter pour accéder aux réponses

card.noResponsesToDownload: Il n’y a pas de réponses disponibles pour le téléchargement.

notifications.trySelectingLessFilesHeader: Seules {{max}} réponses peuvent être téléchargées à la fois.
notifications.trySelectingLessFiles: Vous avez {{max}} réponses sélectionnées. Décochez au moins 1 réponse avant de télécharger.
notifications.atLeastOneFileHeader: Au moins un fichier doit être sélectionné à télécharger.
notifications.atLeastOneFile: Essayez de sélectionner au moins un fichier à télécharger.
notifications.errorDownloadingFilesHeader: Erreur lors du téléchargement des fichiers sélectionnés.
notifications.errorDownloadingFiles: Réessayez dans quelques minutes. Si le problème persiste, contactez

confirmReceiptDialog.title: Confirm receipt of responses[fr]
confirmReceiptDialog.findCode: Find the confirmation code on the bottom of the downloaded form response. They look like, c0c42c90-b816-49da-a69a-80bfd8ba15db.[fr]
confirmReceiptDialog.copyCode: Copy and paste up-to {{max}} confirmation codes, one per line.[fr]
confirmReceiptDialog.responsesAvailableFor: After you confirm, responses are available for 7 days then automatically removed from our database.[fr]

minEntries.title: At least one response must be specified[fr]
minEntries.description: Enter the confirmation codes for responses that you've received.[fr]

maxEntries.title: Only {{max}} responses can be reported at a time.[fr]
maxEntries.description: Enter these form entries before entering more.[fr]

errorEntries.title: An error occurred with the below confirm receipt codes[fr]
errorEntries.description: Please double check the entries are entered correct and try again. Any valid entries were removed from the below list and successfully submitted.[fr]

invalidEntry.title: The confirmation code entered is invalid[fr]
invalidEntry.description: Please try entereing the confirmation code again.[fr]

unknown.title: Something went wrong[fr]
unknown.description: Try submitting the confirm receipt codes again in a few minutes or contact [fr]

reportProblemsDialog.title: Report problems with responses[fr]
reportProblemsDialog.findForm: Find the form number in the form list for any responses that won't download or open. They look like, 31-12-XCRV.[fr]
reportProblemsDialog.enterFormNumbers: Enter up-to {{max}} form numbers, one per line.[fr]
reportProblemsDialog.problemReported: The problem will be reported, and someone will contact you with help.[fr]

minEntries.title: At least one form number must be specified[fr]
minEntries.description: Enter the form number for responses that you've received.[fr]

maxEntries.title: Only {{max}} form number can be reported at a time.[fr]
maxEntries.description: Enter these form numbers before entering more.[fr]

errorEntries.title: An error occurred with the below form number[fr]
errorEntries.description: Please double check the form numbers are entered correct and try again. Any valid form numbers were removed from the below list and successfully submitted.[fr]

invalidEntry.title: The form number entered is invalid[fr]
invalidEntry.description: Please try entereing the form number again.[fr]

unknown.title: Something went wrong[fr]
unknown.description: Try submitting the form numbers again in a few minutes or contact [fr]
